channel.title: 2006 Remake Private Usage UPDATED
channel.description:
[b][u][size=18pt]Hello reader. I posted this just to display some of my work into my soon to be identical copy of 2006 RuneScape. I will NEVER release this to the public and I will not host this server for anyone. I play on it by myself and use this for learning purposes only.[/size][/u][/b]
[size=18pt][b]JUST ADDED BLACK KNIGHTS FORTRESS FROM SCRATCH. This includes the front door not being able to open if you arent wearing bronze med and iron chain. And It required 13 quest points to start. Correct dialogue. Listen through the grate section is excellent. Cabbage drop is excellent[/b][/size]
Done on a Mac. If you are a mac and you need help feel free to PM me
Things that I have added/done:
Added 80% of agility, including 95% of all shortcuts and the courses. (original source came with no agility base at all.)
Client Features:
- Loading full 377 - 50% music system - Macintosh Support, can configure to PC or Linux with some basic knowledge.
Server Features:
Prayer:
- Every prayer works. - You can bury a lot of different types of bones. - Prayer bonus
Agility:
- Only gnome available =[ - 70% agility shortcuts in the world. - Agility level affects run energy
Firemaking:
- Correct animations - When fire goes out, it leaves ashes. - All logs lightable - Firelighters fully functioning - Clipped - Can click logs on the ground and light them
Woodcutting:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Type of hatchet affects cut rate - Correct animations - Can cut all trees - Birds nests
Mining:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Pickaxe type affects speed of mining and animations are correct. - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems
Fletching:
- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
Crafting:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry Molding - Leather and Dragonhide Crafting
Thieving:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Times - Correct loots with random chances of double, triple and quadruple loots.
Cooking:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Eating food - Wine - BREWING
Runecrafting:
- Can't do any runecrafting before Rune Mysteries is completed - Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
Herblore:
- All potions makeable - Identifying herbs - Weapon poisioning - COCONURTS
Smithing:
- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects - Flawless interface
Fishing: - All fish can be caught - Big net fishing - Correct item requirements - Fishing spots located all around the world - Correct animations
Slayer - Working slayer gem - Working slayer shop - Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop - Generating task's bound on combatlevel/slayerlevel - All slayer masters - All slayer masters can give you the slayer location - XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task
Farming
- All plants in the skill tab working - Watering, disease, trees! - Farming is done 100%
Combat:
- PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) - Equipment requirements - Degradable equipment - Weapon poisoning
Bosses:
-Dagganoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagganoth Prime -Giant Mole -King Black Dragon
Minigames:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Barrows -Fight Pits
Random Events:
-Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie -Rock Golem -Spirit Tree - Frog Random -Evil Chicken - Swarm -Random Event Handling System
Quests:
-Cook's Assistant, Doric's Quest, Imp Catchter, Goblin Diplomacy, Restless Ghost, Rune Mysteries, Sheep Shearer, Witch's Potion, Black Knights Fortress -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)
Miscellaneous:
- Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests - Around 5-6 random events in place as of now - All skills done to full completion - Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) - Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) - Skill interfaces - Pets - Working objects all around the world - 2500 + npcs spawned - Christmas Crackers - Holiday drops - Working desert - Single and double doors - All guilds - All food that runescape had in 2006 - Normal and ancient magics - All runescapes shops that were in 2006 - 80% runescapes potions - Correct runescape start - Sailing - Gnome Glider - Bank Pins - Correct runescape teleports - Wilderness warning - All rings/amulets - Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req - Tele tabs - Tele other - Lots of minigames - Clipping following/npcs - Empty handler added for items that can be emptied - Crystal Chest - Flour Mill - Runescape prices - Chat filtering - Running/w energy - Magic Carpet - Skill Guides - Same exp rates as runescape. - Weapon Poisoning - Music/Sounds
Fixed up crafting and made it not display whack stuff.
Fixed smithing interface (the one where you choose which bar you would like to smelt) and now it doesn't have that random number above the Mithril Bar.
Full 100% Farming. Growing time is also the same as RuneScape.
Full working weight system done by meeee!!!
Added over 50 different NPC dialogues and shops. Bartenders have the dialogue for "would you like to buy a beer?"
Added Diango and working Holiday event return item system. Also made toy horseys work and display their message as well as the spinning plate. (there was no kite back then =[ )
You need the Dramen Staff to be able to go to Zanaris.
Entrana Monks check for all weapons and armor.
Added the tree spirit for the dramen tree, you cant chop before it is killed.
99% of all doors in the game work. Only 70% of stairwells and stuff work sadly. I havent bothered lol.
Global Drop system, with holiday drops such as Scythe, Hween Mask, Phat, Santas, Bunny Ears.
Added the infamous welcome screen =] took over 2 weeks to figure out what the problem was. It was the client LOL
Added Guilds, cant make cooking guild and magic guild work sadly...
Combat, correct hit equations as well as the level required to use them.
Excellent Slayer, including dialogue and shops AND you need to be wielding or carrying certain items to kill certain enemies.
Barrows has a few issues but otherwise id say 85%
Castle wars 90%
Gnomeball (lololol) 100%
TREASURE TRAILS 100%!!!! includes all types of clues as well as correct random reward system.
Music system. =] region affects the music played.
Many useful commands. Moderators are only allowed to mute. Normal players only get the displayfps one.
Added thordur's blackhole (for fun) and made it so that gold crown mods are able to blackhole someone. Fun.
Ban system as well as mute system.
Bank Pin is fully functional and whether or not you have it displays correctly on the welcome screen. (bank pin also includes the delay)
Kharidian desert is only 20% completed.
Wilderness/Pvp is working 100%.
Fixed Duel arena bug where you would lose items and couldnt retrieve them.
90% of ALL skills work 100%
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mn42zk.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/24vl468.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/n1ov7k.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2s6ncqp.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/242xtu1.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/34zdfr5.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2s6t4lt.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/34o26m9.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2q16kjm.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/241uu6d.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/25ow3n4.png[/img]

item.title: 2006 Remake Private Usage UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You’re pretty stupid if you’re clearing out the quest tab like that. It’s gonna leave behind the hover text which isn’t very pretty. Adjust the interface client sided, here’s a start.

	public static void questTab(TextDrawingArea[] TDA) {
		RSInterface Interface = addInterface(638);
		setChildren(4, Interface);
		addText(29155, "Quests", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
		addButton(29156, 1, "QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18,
				"Swap to Achievement Diary", 1);
		addSprite(29157, 0, "QuestTab/QUEST");
		setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface);
		setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface);
		setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface);
		setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 3, Interface);
		Interface = addInterface(29160);
		Interface.height = 214;
		Interface.width = 165;
		Interface.scrollMax = 50;
		setChildren(4, Interface);
		addHoverText(29161, "Welcome To Falador", "View Quest", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
		addHoverText(29162, "The Butchers Meat", "View Quest", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);

No, this code won’t work. And don’t hold me to this because idek where I got it tbh, ripped it from an old project but got no clue if I took it from another client or not. It works when completed though.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 Remake Private Usage UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:34, topic:527037”]ILY

Also, do you know how to get rid of the “qj1” “qj2” and stuff[/quote]

/**
	 * Gets rid of the qj1, qj2, qj3 on the quest interface.
	 * @param player
	 * @param aString
	 * @return
	 */
	public static String clearInformation(Player player, String aString) {
		for(int i = 8144; i < 8244; i++) {
			player.getActionSender().sendString(aString, i);
		}
		return aString;
	}

Read full topic
